paragraph: Haruka Yamazaki (山崎 はるか, born June 27, 1991 in Kanagawa Prefecture) is a Japanese voice actress and singer affiliated with Arts Vision. Yamazaki has had main roles in several anime shows including as Tomoyo Kanzaki in When Supernatural Battles Became Commonplace, Lilith Bristol in Absolute Duo, and Mero in Monster Musume.
